attributes.action: gid rid of beggers and charities hassling people in the streets
attributes.additional_details:
resubmitting this as I would like the government to bring harsher rules for charities a pproaching people in the street making it clear what they can do and cannot do to people askng fo rmoney.

also i would like the government to ban beggers from the streets or authorise the police to move them on regardless as it is downright insulting esepecially for foreign people expecting money from us and makek immigrants work or take tidlying bins etc and leave the office work for us British people.
